# looker_role_groups (Resource)

## Example Usage
```terraform
resource "looker_role_groups" "role_member" {
  role_id = "345"
  group {
    id = looker_group.group_admin.id
  }
}
```

## Example Output
```terraform
% terraform show
# looker_role_member.role_member:
resource "looker_role_groups" "role_member" {
  id             = "-"
  role_id = "345"
  group {
    id   = "1"
    name = "group"
  }
}
```
